info.description: Arrangements API is used to get the customer’s account-related information. This information includes Account details, Balance and other interest-related information. Arrangement APIs are connected to other microservices or T24 to fetch the customer’s account details based on the user requirement.
info.title: ArrangementsAPI

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: Arrangements API is used to get the customer’s account related information. This information includes Account details, Balance and other interest related information. Arrangement APIs are connected to other Micro services or T24 to fetch the customer’s account details based on the user requirement.

post.summary: This API retrieves the details of an account. This API is invoked when the customer selects an account from the Dashboard screen. All the details about the account such as account holder name, available balance, account type, and so on are fetched and displayed to the customer.

This API fetches all the accounts associated with the customer such as savings, deposit, credit accounts, and so on from the associated Microservice or T24. The accounts that are fetched are displayed to the customer based on the account type. This API gets invoked immediately after a customer signs in to his/her account.

accountID.description: Specifies the account ID of the customer.

accountHolder.description: Specifies the name of the primary customer

accountID.description: Specifies the account ID of the customer.

accountli.description: Specifies the list of accounts of a customer

accountName.description: Specifies the name of the account such as Savings, Debit, Credit and so on

accountPreference.description: Specifies the type of account preferred by the customer. Based on his preference the accounts get displayed

accountType.description: Specifies the account type. Based on the account type value the API fetches the respective accounts.

availableBalance.description: Specifies the available balance that a person holds in his account.

availableCredit.description: Specifies the available credit that a customer can avail to meet his requirements.

availablePoints.description: Specifies the points that are available to the customer. The customer can use these points to avail the benefits that his/her bank offers

bankName.description: Specifies the name of the bank in which the customer has created an account

bondInterest.description: Specifies the interest amount that the bond provides to the customer

bondInterestLastYear.description: Specifies the interest amount that the bond provided during the previous year.

bsbNum.description: Specifies the Bank-State-Branch number to identify various banks and branches. This number is exclusive to Australia.

closingDate.description: Specifies the closing data for the account.

creditCardNumber.description: Specifies the credit card number of the customer

creditLimit.description: Specifies the limit on credit up to which the customer can avail

currencyCode.description: Specifies the code of your currency such as EUR, USD, JPY, and so on.

currentAmountDue.description: Specifies the due amount that has to be paid by the customer.

currentBalance.description: Specifies the current balance of your account

deviceID.description: Specifies the ID of the customer's device

dividendLastPaidAmount.description: Specifies the dividend amount that was paid to the customer last time

dividendLastPaidDate.description: Specifies the date on which the dividend amount that was paid last time.

dividendPaidYTD.description: Specifies the dividend amount that was paid from the beginning of the current year to the present date (Year To Date)

dividendRate.description: Specifies the rate of dividend that is to be paid to the customer

dividendYTD.description: Specifies the amount of divided that has to be paid from the beginning of the current year to the present date

dueDate.description: Specifies the due date by which the dividend must be paid by the customer.

eStatementEnable.description: Specifies whether the provision of electronic statement has been enabled or not for the customer

favouriteStatus.description: Specifies the status of the customer.

interestEarned.description: Specifies the amount of interest that a customer has earned.

interestPaidLastYear.description: Specifies the amount of interest that a customer has paid in the previous year

interestPaidPreviousYTD.description: Specifies the amount of interest that the customer has paid from the beginning of the last year to the present date in the previous year.

interestPaidYTD.description: Specifies the interest paid by the customer from the beginning of the current year to the present date

interestRate.description: Specifies the rate of interest that a customer has to pay

isInternationalAccount.description: Specifies whether that account is internationally valid or not

jointHolders.description: Specifies the list of joint holders

lastDividendPaidAmount.description: Specifies the amount of dividend that was paid last time to the customer

lastDividendPaidDate.description: Specifies the date on which the dividend was paid last time

lastPaymentAmount.description: Specifies the amount that was transacted last time

lastPaymentDate.description: Specifies the date on which the transaction took place last time

lastStatementBalance.description: Specifies the fee amount that was in due for the last time

maturityAmount.description: Specifies the amount that has to be paid after maturity of your deposit or bond

maturityDate.description: Specifies the date on which the bond or deposit matures

minimumDue.description: Specifies the minimum amount that can be in due

nickName.description: Specifies the nick name of the customer

openingDate.description: Specifies the opening date for the account

originalAmount.description: Specifies the original amount that the customer has to pay

outstandingBalance.description: Specifies the overall balance amount that has to be paid by the customer

paymentDue.description: Specifies the amount that is due for payment

paymentMethod.description: Specifies the method in which the payment transaction has to be made

paymentTerm.description: Specifies the time period before which the payment has to be made

payoffAmount.description: Specifies the payoff amount that has to be paid

pendingDeposit.description: Specifies the deposit amount that is pending to be paid

pendingWithdrawal.description: Specifies the pending withdrawals by the customer

phoneId.description: Specifies the ID of customer's mobile device

previousYearDividend.description: Specifies the dividend amount that was payed the previous year

previousYearsDividends.description: Specifies the list of all the dividends that were payed earlier

principalBalance.description: Specifies the principal balance in the customer's account

principalValue.description: Specifies the principal value for an interest that has to be paid by the customer

regularPaymentAmount.description: Specifies the amount that has to be paid in a time-bound period

routingNumber.description: Specifies the routing number of a customer

supportBillPay.description: Specifies whether the account supports bill pay or not

supportCardlessCash.description: Specifies whether the account supports cardless cash or not

supportDeposit.description: Specifies whether the account accepts deposits

supportTransferFrom.description: Specifies if the account can receive amount from other accounts

supportTransferTo.description: Specifies if the account supports transferring amount to another account

swiftCode.description: Specifies the swift code for international transactions

totalCreditMonths.description: Specifies the total number of credit months available to the customer

totalDebitsMonth.description: Specifies the total number of debit months available to the customer

transactionLimit.description: Specifies the limit of transactions that a customer can make

transferLimit.description: Specifies the limit on the amount that can be transferred to other account

unpaidInterest.description: Specifies the interest amount that is in due by the customer

userName.description: Specifies the user name of the customer

email.description: Specifies the email ID of the customer

jointAccountHolder1.description: Specifies the name of one of the joint account holder

jointAccountHolder2.description: Specifies the name of one of the joint account holders

bankAddress.description: Specifies the address details of the bank

intermediaryBankName.description: Specifies the name of intermediary bank that operates between the customer and the original bank

intermediaryBankAddress.description: Specifies the address of the intermediary bank that operates between the customer and the original bank

intermediaryBankSwiftCode.description: Specifies the swift code of the intermediary bank that operates between the customer and the original bank for international transactions

supportChecks.description: Specifies whether the bank carries out any checks or verifications for the customer

serviceName.description: Specifies the name of the service that is being used to fetch the account data

phone.description: Specifies the phone number of the customer

accountSubType.description: Specifies the sub type of the account

description.description: Specifies the description about the customer

schemeName.description: Specifies the name of the scheme.

identification.description: Specifies the identification mechanism for the customer

secondaryIdentification.description: Specifies the secondary type of identification mechanism

servicerSchemeName.description: Specifies the name of the servicer scheme

servicerIdentification.description: Specifies the code to identify the servicer

dataCreditDebitIndicator.description: Specifies whether the amount is being debited or credited

dataDateTime.description: Specifies the date and time based on customer's location

dataCreditLineIncluded.description: Specifies the credit line extended by the bank to customer that is included in the account

dataCreditLineType.description: Specifies the type of credit line that is extended by the bank to the customer

dataCreditLineAmount.description: Specifies the amount of credit line that is extended by the bank to the customer

dataCreditLineCurrency.description: Specifies the currency in which the credit line was extended by the bank to the customer

IBAN.description: Specifies the International Bank Account Number that is necessary for international accounts

displayName.description: Specifies the display name for the account

Account_id.description: Specifies the unique ID number of your account

Organization_Id.description: Specifies the unique ID number of your organization

Account_Type.description: Specifies the type of account such as savings, deposits, credit, and so on

Customer_id.description: Specifies the unique ID of the customer

Membership_id.description: Specifies the unique membership ID number of the customer

Taxid.description: Specifies the unique Tax ID of the customer

Ssn.description: Specifies the social security number of the customer

Status.description: Specifies the status of the operation

Ownership.description: Specifies the ownership details over the account

LastUpdated.description: Specifies the last date on which the operation was updated

UpdatedBy.description: Specifies the name of person who updated the operation

userId.description: Specifies the unique ID of the user/customer

address.description: Specifies the address details of the customer

dateOfBirth.description: Specifies the date of birth of the customer

firstName.description: Specifies the first name of the customer

transactionCurrency.description: Specifies the currency in which the transaction must be made

lastName.description: Specifies the last name of the customer

stateId.description: Specifies the unique ID of the customer

productId.description: Specifies the unique ID of the product

payingAccount.description: Specifies the account out of which the amount is being debited

payoutAccount.description: Specifies the account out of which the amount is to be credited

duration.description: Specifies the duration for the request to process

isBusinessAccount.description: Specifies whether the account is a business account or not

actions.description: Specifies the various acctions supported by the account such as credit, debit, and so on

campaignId.description: Specifies the unique ID of the campaign

processingTime.description: Specifies the time taken by the application to process the customer's request

logoURL.description: Specifies the logo URL for the digital banking application

productType.description: Specifies the type of the product

term.description: Specifies the term up to which the account is valid

connectionAlertDays.description: Specifies the days on which the conection alerts are issued

expiresAt.description: Specifies the time/ date on which the account expires

bankCode.description: Specifies the code of the bank
